column4: Hello. Can I use repositories from Hardy for the Dapper? Some software in the Dapper's repos have very old version :-)
Not if you don't want to break your system.
If there are backports for those packages, you could try them but the long-term solution is probably to upgrade or reinstall.
ok, now i find the good solution for me. I find http://mirror.noreply.org/pub and program which i need there.
